metadata.notes: NYS adult-use dispensaries predominantly use Dutchie, not Jane. Jane is primarily used by medical/MSO dispensaries (Columbia Care, Vireo) which are not part of the OCM adult-use retailer list.

findings.summary: After scanning 55 NYS adult-use dispensary websites from the 238 operational retailers, zero iHeartJane-powered menus were discovered.
findings.janeUsage: Medical dispensaries only (not in OCM adult-use list)
websitesChecked: cornerhousecannabis.com - Uses Dutchie (Pay By Bank / DutchiePay)

medicalJaneStores.note: These are MEDICAL dispensaries in NY using Jane - NOT part of OCM adult-use retailers

recommendations.priority: LOW - Jane coverage is not needed for NYS adult-use market at this time
recommendations.action: Focus on Dutchie scraping for NYS coverage
recommendations.monitor: Re-scan quarterly for new Jane integrations
